Ebbro P-4 P404 Nissan Skyline GT-R (R34) 1999 JGTC Series GT500 Class 8th Place K. Hoshino/M. Kageyama

Purchased: 2014

1999 was the first year for the R34 in the JGTC series. Kazuyoshi Hoshino and Masami Kageyama drove their Calsonic Skyline to 8th overall in the GT500 class. Their best result was a 3rd place finish in Round 2 in the All Japan Fuji GT Race.

The model looks good but is let down by the overinflated tires.
